description: Detects Remote Utilities Host service installation on the target system.
name: Remote Utilities Host Service Install
query: winlog.channel:System AND ((event.code:7045 AND winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager) AND ((winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*\\rutserv.exe* AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*\-service*) OR winlog.event_data.ServiceName:Remote\ Utilities\ \-\ Host))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
